home.title: Gourmet Pizza, Delivered.
home.subtitle: Chef-perfected artisan pizzas with our signature microgreen finish. Uncompromising quality with convenient pickup and delivery options.
home.feature1Text: Pesticide-free, hyper-fresh greens that elevate every bite
home.feature2Text: Premium handcrafted dough for unmatched flavor and texture
home.feature3Text: Seven distinct pizzas perfected in every detail, no customization needed
home.feature4Text: Schedule pickup or choose convenient flat-fee delivery to your door
home.orderHeading: Order Now, Pick Up or Deliver
home.orderSubtitle: Schedule your pickup or choose our flat-fee delivery. Quick, convenient, and fresh to your order.
home.menuSubtitle: Each pizza is a chef-driven masterpiece, finished with our signature microgreens for the perfect balance of flavor and freshness.
home.qualitySubtitle: Every ingredient is chosen for its purity, flavor, and integrity. Our philosophy is simple: perfection in every detail, from dough to delivery.
home.sustainabilitySubtitle: Our commitment to quality extends beyond taste to environmental responsibility and guaranteed freshness.
home.testimonialSubtitle: Real experiences from pizza lovers who've discovered the Da Elmo Gourmet difference.

pizza.tricoloreDesc: The perfect Italian classic featuring mozzarella, San Marzano tomatoes, and fresh basil leaves. The three colours of the Italian flag in pure form.
pizza.pepperoniDesc: Bold and spicy with premium pepperoni, roasted peppers, and mushrooms. Balanced by sharp radish microgreens.
pizza.verdeDesc: Our white pizza with garlic-herb oil, mozzarella, fresh parsley, and lemon zest.
pizza.medCoastDesc: Bright and tangy with feta, mixed olives, tomatoes, and red pepper flakes. Baby arugula adds a peppery finish.
pizza.midnightDesc: San Marzano tomato sauce over a garlic-infused avocado oil base, with savoury Parmigiano Reggiano and fresh basil.
pizza.tuscanDesc: The ultimate vegetable-forward pizza with roasted broccoli, cauliflower, peppers, and cremini mushrooms. Topped with classic broccoli microgreens.
pizza.funghiDesc: Classic Italian pairing of cremini mushrooms and red onion with Parmigiano Reggiano. Double garnish of radish microgreens and basil.

quality.doughText: Our signature dough is handcrafted using premium avocado oil and high-quality flour. This unique combination creates a foundation of unmatched flavor, texture, and nutritional value that sets us apart from traditional pizza dough.
quality.tomatoText: Our rich, vibrant sauce starts with authentic San Marzano tomatoes, ensuring a true Italian base. These prized tomatoes are grown in volcanic soil, delivering the perfect balance of sweetness and acidity that defines exceptional pizza sauce.
quality.microgreensText: Our hallmark is the final touch of hyper-fresh, GMO-free, pesticide-free microgreens. Each variety is intentionally chosen to balance and elevate its pizza, from peppery radish microgreens to micro arugula, adding the perfect finishing note.
quality.menuText: We eliminate the complexity of customization to focus solely on perfecting a curated menu of seven distinct, chef-driven pizzas. Every detail is perfected, every ingredient is deliberate, and every bite delivers an uncompromising gourmet experience.

features.compostableText: Your microgreens arrive in clear compostable clamshell containers, ensuring they stay crisp, dry, and vibrant. Never crushed or wilted during transport, they're ready for the perfect final scatter on your pizza.
features.freshnessText: Every pizza is prepared with the freshest ingredients. Our packaging system preserves the perfect temperature and texture from our kitchen to your table, ensuring restaurant-quality results every time.
features.packagingText: We're committed to environmental responsibility with compostable and recyclable packaging materials. Our portion cups and delivery containers are designed to minimize waste while maintaining the highest standards of food safety.
features.deliveryText: We manage the entire delivery experience with convenient pickup and flat-rate delivery options. Fast, reliable, and tracked in real-time, your gourmet pizza arrives exactly when you expect it.

testimonials.quote1: The microgreen finish is absolutely genius! I've never tasted pizza this fresh and sophisticated delivered to my door. The Pizza Tricolore is perfection.
testimonials.quote2: Fast delivery and incredible quality. The compostable cups for the greens show they really care about sustainability. The Pepperoni Rustico with radish microgreens is my new obsession!
testimonials.quote3: As someone who values quality ingredients, I'm blown away by the avocado oil dough and San Marzano tomatoes. You can taste the difference. The Midnight Marinara is restaurant-quality!

footer.copyright: 2025 Da Elmo Gourmet Pizzeria Inc. All rights reserved.

pizzamenu.heroSubtitle2: Experience artisan pizza crafted with premium avocado oil dough and finished with GMO-free microgreens. Seven signature pizzas, available for pickup or delivery.
pizzamenu.slide2Text: From Pepperoni Rustico to Verde Fresco, each pizza is a carefully curated masterpiece crafted with San Marzano tomatoes and finished with signature microgreens.
pizzamenu.slide3Text: Fresh microgreens delivered separately in compostable cups. Scatter them on your pizza for the perfect finish that balances every bite with vibrant, living flavor.
pizzamenu.menuSubtitle: Each pizza is a non-customizable masterpiece featuring high-quality ingredients and signature microgreen finishes
pizzamenu.funghi_desc: Rich, earthy cremini mushrooms and sweet red onions on San Marzano sauce with mozzarella and Parmigiano Reggiano.
pizzamenu.medcoast_desc: Mozzarella, tangy feta cheese, mixed olives, and fresh tomatoes on San Marzano sauce with a pinch of red pepper flakes.
pizzamenu.tuscan_desc: Roasted broccoli, cauliflower, peppers, and saut√©ed mushrooms on San Marzano sauce with mozzarella and Parmigiano Reggiano.
pizzamenu.verde_desc: Garlic-infused avocado oil with fresh parsley, lemon zest, mozzarella cheese and Parmigiano Reggiano. No tomato sauce.
pizzamenu.pepperoni_desc: High-quality pepperoni with saut√©ed mushrooms and roasted peppers, mozzarella cheese finished with radish microgreens for gourmet contrast.
pizzamenu.tricolore_desc: San Marzano tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil. A celebration of Italy's finest ingredients.
pizzamenu.midnight_desc: San Marzano tomato sauce over aromatic garlic-infused avocado oil base, finished with a savory dusting of Parmigiano Reggiano and wild dried oregano.
pizzamenu.microgreenSubtitle: GMO-Free, Pesticide-Free Excellence That Elevates Every Bite
pizzamenu.mg1Text: Our microgreens are harvested at peak freshness and delivered separately to ensure they arrive crisp, vibrant, and full of life. No wilting, no crushing‚Äîjust living flavor ready to finish your pizza.
pizzamenu.mg2Text: We source only the purest microgreens, grown without GMOs or pesticides. Every leaf represents our commitment to uncompromising quality and integrity, ensuring you taste nothing but clean, vibrant flavor.
pizzamenu.mg3Text: Each pizza receives a signature microgreen that's specifically chosen to balance and elevate its profile. Radish microgreens cut through rich pepperoni, micro arugula brightens salty feta and adds peppery freshness to white pizza.
pizzamenu.mg4Text: Scatter your microgreens just before serving to experience the vibrant crunch and explosive flavor that transforms each bite. It's the chef's signature finish, now in your hands, completing the gourmet experience we've perfected.
pizzamenu.packagingSubtitle: From our kitchen to your table, every detail is perfected
pizzamenu.pkg_compostable_text: Your signature microgreens arrive in clear compostable clamshell containers, ensuring they stay crisp, dry, and vibrant throughout delivery. Never crushed, never wilted‚Äîjust ready to scatter.
pizzamenu.pkg_delivery_text: Order our complete menu for convenient pickup or delivery. We manage the entire process, ensuring fast, reliable service from our kitchen to your door with precision timing.
pizzamenu.pkg_freshness_text: Our packaging system is designed to preserve every element of your pizza experience. Hot pizza arrives hot, microgreens arrive fresh, and quality arrives uncompromised‚Äîevery single time.
pizzamenu.craft_subtitle: Every ingredient chosen for purity, flavor, and integrity
pizzamenu.craft_avocado_text: Our signature handcrafted dough uses premium avocado oil for a lighter, healthier base with exceptional flavor and texture. Every crust is made fresh daily with high-quality flour for the perfect foundation.
pizzamenu.craft_tomato_text: Our rich, vibrant sauce starts with authentic San Marzano tomatoes from Italy. Known for their sweet flavor and low acidity, they provide the true Italian base that defines gourmet pizza excellence.
pizzamenu.craft_mozz_text: We source a superior, low-moisture mozzarella that is carefully selected for its rich, clean flavour and exceptional melting characteristics. The result is a final texture that melts into a golden, cohesive blanket without compromising the crispness of our crust.
pizzamenu.craft_chef_text: We eliminate the complexity of customization to focus solely on perfecting seven distinct, chef-driven pizzas. Every ingredient combination is intentionally balanced and tested to deliver an uncompromising gourmet experience.
pizzamenu.wine_subtitle: Elevate your gourmet experience with perfectly matched pairings
pizzamenu.wine_funghi_desc: The "Garden Lift üå∏": Naturally bubbly and floral, this local kombucha lifts the "umami" of the mushrooms and makes the sweet onions pop with flavor.
pizzamenu.wine_medcoast_desc: The "Spicy Med üå∂Ô∏è": The spicy heat of real ginger is the ultimate match for salty feta and olives, refreshing your taste buds after every tangy bite.
pizzamenu.wine_tuscan_desc: The "Zesty Partner üçã": Tart and crisp, this lemon soda acts as a palate cleanser, cutting through the roasted flavors of the vegetables for a bright, clean finish.
pizzamenu.wine_verde_desc: The "Matcha Glow üåø": Earthy Japanese matcha and organic lemon zest in the drink perfectly mirror the fresh parsley and citrus notes on this vibrant white pizza.
pizzamenu.wine_pepperoni_desc: The "Rustico Kick üî•": The natural zing of local ginger matches the peppery bite of our radish greens, perfectly balancing the richness of the pepperoni.
pizzamenu.wine_tricolore_desc: The "Sunny Classic ‚òÄÔ∏è": The bright, sparkling orange flavor provides a refreshing "snap" that lets the herbal aroma of fresh basil truly shine.
pizzamenu.cta_subtitle: Experience chef-perfected artisan pizza with microgreen finishes delivered straight to your door

philosophy.hero_title: Our Culinary Philosophy: Purity in Every Ingredient
philosophy.hero_subtitle: From San Marzano tomatoes to the pristine essence of avocado oil dough, every element of our craft is chosen with intention. Our signature GMO-free, pesticide-free microgreens complete each pizza with a finishing touch that transforms flavor into art.
philosophy.sanmarzano_title: San Marzano Tomatoes: The Heart of Authenticity
philosophy.sanmarzano_text1: Our sauce begins with certified San Marzano tomatoes. These legendary tomatoes possess a naturally lower acidity, thicker flesh, and fewer seeds, delivering a rich, balanced sweetness that defines true Italian pizza.
philosophy.sanmarzano_text2: We slow-simmer our tomatoes with a minimal blend of sea salt, extra virgin olive oil, and fresh basil, allowing the pure fruit flavor to shine. No added sugars, no preservatives‚Äîjust the essence of the world's finest tomatoes, brought to your table.
philosophy.avocado_title: Avocado Oil Dough: The Foundation of Flavor
philosophy.avocado_text1: Our signature dough is handcrafted daily using premium avocado oil‚Äîa deliberate choice that elevates both nutrition and taste. Unlike traditional olive oil or butter-based doughs, avocado oil provides a subtle, buttery richness with a higher smoke point, creating a perfectly crisp exterior while maintaining a tender, airy crumb.
philosophy.avocado_text2: We blend our avocado oil with high-protein flour, sea salt, and a carefully balanced fermentation process that develops complex flavours over 48 hours. The result is a crust that's both indulgent and light, with a delicate golden finish that holds up beautifully during delivery.
philosophy.microgreens_title: The Microgreen Finishing Touch: Purity, Freshness, Perfection
philosophy.microgreens_subtitle: Our microgreens aren't just for decoration. These are superfoods! Whether it's baby broccoli or radish, these tiny plants can have up to 40 times more vitamins than the full-grown vegetables. It's the healthiest crunch you'll ever have on a pizza.
philosophy.radish_desc: Sharp, peppery bite with a hint of horseradish heat. Cuts through rich meats and cheese.
philosophy.radish_perfect: Perfect for: Pepperoni Rustico, Funghi e Cipolla
philosophy.arugula_desc: Tender, peppery leaves with a subtle nuttiness. Adds freshness without overpowering delicate flavors.
philosophy.arugula_perfect: Perfect for: Verde Fresco, Mediterranean Coast
philosophy.broccoli_desc: Classic, slightly peppery flavor with earthy undertones. Harmonizes beautifully with roasted vegetables.
philosophy.basil_desc: Aromatic, sweet herbaceous flavor with anise undertones. The classic Italian garnish for Margherita-style pizzas.
philosophy.basil_perfect: Perfect for: Pizza Tricolore, Funghi e Cipolla, Midnight Marinara
philosophy.sustainability_subtitle: Our commitment extends beyond flavor to environmental responsibility
philosophy.delivery_text: Our entire operation is designed for convenient pickup and flat-rate delivery. We manage timing, packaging, and quality control to ensure every pizza arrives at your door as if it just left our oven‚Äîhot, fresh, and perfectly presented with your microgreens ready to finish.
philosophy.packaging_text: From our microgreen cups to our pizza boxes, every piece of packaging is designed to break down naturally. We eliminate single-use plastics wherever possible.
philosophy.cta_title: Experience Uncompromising Quality Delivered to Your Door
philosophy.cta_text: Our pizzas are delivered fresh to your door: hot crust, vibrant sauce, perfectly melted cheese, and crisp microgreens packaged separately in compostable cups. Order now via pickup or delivery and taste the difference that ingredient purity makes.

about.hero_subtitle: Chef-Perfected, Microgreen-Finished. Uncompromising Quality from Kitchen to Door.
about.story_text: Da Elmo Gourmet Pizzeria was born from a singular vision: to deliver a true gourmet pizza experience without compromise. We are an artisan kitchen dedicated to perfecting every element of our craft. We eliminate the complexity of customization, instead focusing our expertise on seven distinct, chef-driven pizzas. Each recipe is meticulously developed, balancing premium ingredients with our signature microgreen finishes. From the first bite of our avocado oil dough to the vibrant crunch of pesticide-free microgreens, we guarantee an experience that elevates artisan pizza to haute cuisine. Our signature dough is handcrafted using premium avocado oil and high-quality flour, creating a foundation that is both flavorful and light. The avocado oil adds a subtle richness and helps achieve the perfect crispy-yet-tender texture.
about.delivery_subtitle: We own every step of the journey from our kitchen to your door, ensuring your gourmet experience arrives perfectly.
about.delivery_card1_text: Every pizza is handcrafted by trained chefs in our artisan kitchen, using premium avocado oil dough and San Marzano tomatoes.
about.delivery_card2_text: Microgreens arrive in compostable portion cups, ensuring they stay crisp and vibrant for your final scatter.
about.delivery_card3_text: Fast, reliable delivery through Uber Eats connects our artisan kitchen directly to your location with real-time tracking.
about.delivery_card4_text: Access our complete menu through DoorDash for convenient delivery with seamless ordering and accurate arrival times.
about.delivery_card5_text: We coordinate baking schedules with delivery windows to ensure your pizza arrives at peak freshness and temperature.
about.delivery_card6_text: Each order is inspected before departure, guaranteeing that our uncompromising standards reach your door.
about.philosophy_subtitle: Every ingredient tells a story of purity, flavor, and integrity. Discover the foundations that make our pizzas extraordinary.
about.philosophy_item1_text: Our signature dough is handcrafted using premium avocado oil and high-quality flour, creating a foundation that is both flavorful and light. The avocado oil adds a subtle richness and helps achieve the perfect crispy-yet-tender texture.
about.philosophy_item2_text: We start with authentic San Marzano tomatoes, renowned for their sweet flavor and low acidity. Each sauce is seasoned to perfection, providing a rich, vibrant base that honors true Italian tradition.
about.philosophy_item3_text: Our hallmark is the final microgreen finish. GMO-free and pesticide-free, these hyper-fresh greens intentionally balance each pizza. From peppery radish microgreens to baby arugula, each variety is chosen to elevate and complete the flavor profile.
about.gallery_subtitle: Each pizza is a chef-driven masterpiece, finished with precision-selected microgreens. Non-customizable. Perfected.
about.sustainability_subtitle: Our commitment to the planet is as uncompromising as our commitment to quality.
about.sustainability_card1_text: Our microgreens arrive in compostable clamshell containers that break down naturally, reducing environmental impact while keeping your garnish crisp and vibrant.
about.sustainability_card2_text: Separate packaging ensures your microgreens never get crushed or wilted during transport, arriving at your door as fresh as they left our kitchen.
about.sustainability_card3_text: We design every aspect of our packaging to minimize waste, using recyclable pizza boxes and eliminating unnecessary plastics wherever possible.
about.sustainability_card4_text: Clear portion cups allow you to see the vibrant color and freshness of your microgreens, guaranteeing quality at first glance.
about.sustainability_card5_text: We partner with local microgreen growers to reduce transportation emissions and support our community, ensuring the freshest possible product.
about.sustainability_card6_text: We continuously research and implement new sustainable practices, from ingredient sourcing to delivery methods, reducing our carbon footprint year over year.
about.team_subtitle: Meet the Executive Chef and Owner behind every perfectly crafted pizza, from dough to microgreen finish.
about.team_chef_bio: I am a Pizzaiolo with 10 years of experience, driven by a commitment to true artisanal quality. My entire six-pizza menu is a testament to this, defined by my self-developed, signature avocado oil dough. The philosophy here is simple: control the ingredients. I personally manage all kitchen and business operations, from the exacting process of roasting and seasoning our produce to growing our own microgreens. It's a complete farm-to-table mindset, ensuring unparalleled freshness in every bite.
about.quality_commitment_subtitle: GMO-free, pesticide-free microgreens and high-integrity components define our uncompromising standards.
about.quality_card1_text: Every microgreen we use is guaranteed GMO-free, sourced from trusted growers who share our commitment to natural, unmodified produce.
about.quality_card2_text: Our microgreens are cultivated without synthetic pesticides, ensuring the purest, cleanest finish for your pizza.
about.quality_card3_text: Our microgreens are harvested at peak freshness and delivered within hours, preserving maximum flavor, nutrition, and vibrant color.
about.quality_card4_text: We exclusively use high-grade avocado oil in our dough, prized for its heart-healthy fats, high smoke point, and subtle flavor enhancement.
about.quality_card5_text: Every ingredient is sourced from suppliers who meet our rigorous standards for quality, ethics, and sustainability.
about.quality_card6_text: Our chef personally approves every ingredient batch, ensuring only the finest components reach your pizza.
about.pizza_funghi_desc: Saut√©ed cremini mushrooms and red onion on San Marzano base, crowned with Parmigiano Reggiano. Finished with radish microgreens and fresh basil for a spicy, sharp contrast.
about.pizza_medcoast_desc: Mozzarella and crumbled feta with mixed olives, Roma tomatoes, and red pepper flakes. Finished with baby arugula for a bright, peppery note that cuts the saltiness.
about.pizza_tuscan_desc: Loaded with roasted broccoli, cauliflower, peppers, and saut√©ed mushrooms on mozzarella base. Finished with broccoli microgreens for a classic, earthy balance.
about.pizza_verde_desc: White pizza with avocado oil, garlic, parsley, and lemon zest base. Fresh mozzarella, finished with baby arugula for a bright, herbaceous, and peppery note.
about.philosophy_item4_text: We use only the finest cheeses: low-moisture mozzarella for perfect melt, tangy feta for Mediterranean flair, and freshly grated Parmigiano Reggiano for that finishing umami touch.
about.philosophy_item5_text: We focus on seven distinct pizzas, eliminating customization to perfect every detail. Each recipe is chef-driven and non-negotiable, ensuring consistent excellence in every bite.
about.pizza_pepperoni_desc: High-quality pepperoni with saut√©ed mushrooms and roasted peppers on San Marzano base. Radish microgreens deliver bold, spicy contrast.
about.pizza_tricolore_desc: The perfect Italian classic. Fresh Fior di Latte on San Marzano sauce, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil. Finished with fresh basil leaves for aromatic perfection.
about.commitment_card1_text: Every component is chosen for purity and flavor. From authentic San Marzano tomatoes to artisanal cheeses, we never compromise.
about.commitment_card2_text: Every ingredient passes rigorous chef-led quality checks. We refuse anything that doesn't meet our exacting culinary standards.

delivery_page.hero_slide1_subtitle: Uncompromising quality from our kitchen to your door. Experience the freshness of microgreen-finished artisan pizzas with convenient pickup or delivery options.
delivery_page.hero_slide2_subtitle: Our signature microgreens arrive in compostable cups, ensuring crisp, vibrant garnishes that elevate every slice.
delivery_page.hero_slide3_subtitle: Chef-perfected pizzas delivered with eco-friendly packaging. Taste the difference of artisan gourmet cuisine.
delivery_page.process_subtitle: Our seamless delivery process ensures every pizza arrives fresh, hot, and perfectly garnished with our signature microgreens.
delivery_page.process_step1_text: Each pizza is handcrafted in our artisan kitchen using premium avocado oil dough and authentic San Marzano tomato sauce. We meticulously select and prepare every topping to ensure perfect flavor balance.
delivery_page.process_step2_text: Your hot pizza is carefully placed in premium delivery boxes, while our signature GMO-free, pesticide-free microgreens are sealed in clear compostable clamshell containers. This innovative packaging ensures your garnish arrives crisp, vibrant, and never crushed.
delivery_page.process_step3_text: Track your order in real-time through Uber Eats or DoorDash. From the moment your pizza enters the oven to arrival at your door, you'll know exactly when to expect your gourmet meal.
delivery_page.process_step4_text: Upon arrival, simply sprinkle your GMO-free, pesticide-free microgreens directly onto your hot pizza. Each variety‚Äîfrom peppery radish to delicate arugula‚Äîis chosen to enhance your pizza's flavor and elevate your dining experience.
delivery_page.sustainability_subtitle: Environmental responsibility is woven into every aspect of our operation, from ingredient sourcing to final delivery.
delivery_page.sustainability_card1_text: All microgreen containers are made from compostable materials that naturally break down, reducing plastic waste and environmental impact.
delivery_page.sustainability_card2_text: Our pizza boxes are made from 100% recycled cardboard and are fully recyclable. Heat-resistant and grease-proof without harmful chemicals.
delivery_page.sustainability_card3_text: We minimize waste through thoughtful packaging design, recyclable materials, and partnerships with composting facilities.
delivery_page.sustainability_card4_text: Coordinated delivery timing and optimized routing reduce carbon emissions, ensuring your pizza arrives fresh while protecting the planet.
delivery_page.sustainability_card5_text: From avocado oil to San Marzano tomatoes, every ingredient is sourced with sustainability and quality in mind.
delivery_page.sustainability_card6_text: Our artisan model and local partnerships support our community while reducing the environmental footprint of traditional restaurants.
delivery_page.microgreens_subtitle: GMO-Free, Pesticide-Free Excellence That Elevates Every Bite
delivery_page.microgreens_card1_text: Our microgreens are harvested at peak freshness and delivered separately to ensure they arrive crisp, vibrant, and full of life. No wilting, no crushing‚Äîjust living flavor ready to finish your pizza.
delivery_page.microgreens_card2_text: We source only the purest microgreens, grown without GMOs or pesticides. Every leaf represents our commitment to uncompromising quality and integrity.
delivery_page.microgreens_card3_text: Each microgreen variety‚Äîradish, arugula, broccoli, and basil‚Äîis chosen to perfectly complement specific pizzas, creating harmonious flavor profiles.
delivery_page.microgreens_card4_text: These tiny plants pack up to 40 times more nutrients than their full-grown counterparts, adding health benefits to every bite.
delivery_page.philosophy_subtitle: Our commitment to perfection means we've designed seven distinct pizzas, each a masterpiece of flavor balance and quality.
delivery_page.philosophy_item1_text: Each pizza is crafted by our chef with intentional flavor combinations. Every ingredient is chosen for its role in the overall composition.
delivery_page.philosophy_item2_text: Our pizzas are designed with careful consideration of how each component enhances the others, creating harmonious flavor and texture.
delivery_page.philosophy_item3_text: A limited menu allows us to perfect every detail and maintain unwavering standards with every order, every time.
delivery_page.philosophy_item4_text: By controlling our menu, we optimize every step of preparation, packaging, and delivery to ensure perfect arrival at your door.
delivery_page.gallery_subtitle: Explore our seven chef-designed pizzas, each a masterpiece of flavor, texture, and microgreen perfection.
